mapper.insert: insert into member values (member_seq.nextval, default, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{phone}, default, sysdate, sysdate, #{snsId}, default )
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where email=#{email}
select count(*) from member where nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.update: update Member set pwd = #{pwd}, name=#{name}, gender=#{gender}, birth=#{birth}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, updateDate=sysdate where email=#{email} and mStatus='Y'
